verses.name: 1 Peter 1:15
verses.text: But as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;

verses.name: 1 Peter 1:16
verses.text: Because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.

verses.name: 1 Peter 1:17
verses.text: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man’s work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:

verses.name: 1 Peter 1:18
verses.text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;

verses.name: 1 Peter 1:19
verses.text: But with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:
